name: A Night's Watch
description:
UPDATE Ver 1.5 is officially bug free as far as testing can tell.
-
In the growing cold of early winter, you play as Carol, the bard and primary cook of your adventuring party. After a few incidents involving you falling asleep on watch, its decided unanimously to that you will join one of your companions for theirs instead. 

But with whom will you share your night's watch with?

Will the strong and kind wolf barbarian, Renoak, bring the sunrise to your heart?

Or the noble and calm air of the celestial wizard, Tabien, foretell your fate together?

Or will the dark elven rogue, Megarath, steal your heart with her sharp words and wit?

Find out, on a night by the campfire..
------------------
A very self indulgent D n December Project

There may be a few  spelling errors. If you find any please let me know on twitter DM
-
Rated PG+13
Contains a total of 207 Art assets.
170+ are character sprites.
3 Endings for each Character Neutral (Good), Friendship and Romantic
